title: domain extension
extract: A domain extension is the top-level part of the domain name (TLD), such as .com, or .net. A majority of sites use .com, making it easy to forget that at their inception, each domain extension had a specific intended purpose.Jul 31, 2017
extract_html: A domain extension is the top-level part of the domain name (TLD), such as .com, or .net. A majority of sites use .com, making it easy to forget that at their inception, each domain extension had a specific intended purpose.Jul 31, 2017
